text: The Chevrolet Bel Air is a full-size car produced for 25 years from the 1950 to 1975 model years. In 1975, it was succeeded by the Chevrolet Impala. == Generations == === 1950–1954 === 1951 Chevrolet Deluxe Bel Air Hardtop Coupé.jpg|1951 Chevrolet Bel Air === 1955–1957 === 1955 Chevrolet Bel Air cnv - fvrT.jpg|1955 Chevrolet Bel Air convertible === 1958 === 1958 Chevrolet Bel Air.jpg|1958 Chevrolet Bel Air Coupe === 1959–1960 === Chevrolet Bel Air 1959 1.jpg|1959 Chevrolet Bel Air Sedan === 1961–1964 === 1961 Chevrolet Bel Air.jpg|1961 Chevrolet Bel Air Sedan === 1965–1970 === 1965 Chevrolet Bel Air.jpg|1965 Chevrolet Bel Air 2-door Sedan === 1971–1975 === 1971 Bel Air.jpg|1971 Chevrolet Bel Air Police Sedan Category:1950s automobiles Category:1960s automobiles Bel Air Category:Sedans
